name: Boh\eme Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Classic Florals..Key Notes: Blackcurrant, Peony, White Amber..Fragrance Description: This classic and clean, skin-loving floral is a charming and innately cool bouquet with an abundance of peonies and a blush of blackcurrant. The notes of spherical blooms are joined by touches of white flowers including tuberose, rose, and jasmine, while soft white amber and sandalwood offer a smooth and soft finish...About the Bottle: An oversized bow, perfectly imperfect. The LoveShackFancy perfume bottle references founder Rebecca Hessel Cohen’s lifelong love of ribbons with a sculptural bow top that appears tied and tightened by hand. The sky blue and white Ever-Blooming Rosette print is a signature design chosen from over 2,000 in the LoveShackFancy print and lace library to decorate the bottle itself, a softly curved antique-inspired vessel carved with scalloping on top and a ring of rope on the bottom. Once finished, its spray top is removable so the bottle can be upcycled as a bud vase...About the Fragrance: Naturally cool with an undeniable charm. Boh\eme is a spirited floral that captures a peony in full bloom, laced with blackcurrant and soft white amber. A forever romantic, endlessly in pursuit of wanderlust. Created with love and an intriguing, light warmth by perfumer Yves Cassar....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Water (Aqua/Eau), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The spirit of LoveShackFancy is apparent upon first—and second and third—whiff..-Apply on pulse points to wrists, neck, and behind the ears..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin..-This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bottle is cute. Smells nice I guess, you just have to spray 20 times to smell anything at all. 5 mins and it’s gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Still on the fence. Purchased due to multiple articles suggesting this as one of the top ten powdery fragrances on the market. It goes on strong and the powdery soft notes weren’t hitting. Now that it’s sat the entire day I can still smell it and it has more of the subtle soft smell I was looking for. I would say a little goes a long way and to apply sparingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this smells. It soft, floral and warm, however it did not last on my skin or clothes. Disappointing, I had high hopes this could be my signature scent.

reviews.review_title: I don’t just love it, I LURVE it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This shall be my signature scent. This is me. It is so whimsical and floral. It’s a sweet floral, not a fresh floral. It has a bit of a musk, I believe. In my experience, it has outlived all of my other perfumes. I like I Want You by Jimmy Choo, but it’s gone in an hour. And I love the perfume shaped like a robot called Rabainne or something. (Idk, I just like it he’s cute, and it is my ideal scent, it just doesn’t last) But I was going on a long walk under tge hot Texas sun and ppl were still asking me “what are you wearing?”. And I sprayed a coupla hours ago before walking. But please remember, perfume has a lot to do with body chemistry. What works for me doesn’t work for you. But the scent alone in amazing. Just do what I did, and grab the travel size for your purse so you can refresh if you need to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the adorable packaging on this! The main note here is peony and blackcurrant- it’s a great summer or spring scent. The amount of time it stays on the skin is great. I’d try other perfumes from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume makes me feel so fancy and girly. I feel like the peony and white amber out weigh the black currant in this scent. I like to wear this through the day. I think it’s great for spring. It’s more floral smelling than anything in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I typically love floral leaning perfumes, this scent wasn’t for me. I did like the way it fades throughout the day, but I found the scent profile to be a bit too powdery. I do appreciate the travel size version because it’s easy to bring with you when you’re on the go.

reviews.review_title: A great clean and fresh scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this perfume smells. It’s very clean, fresh, and floral. I’ve been wearing it and it lasts for a decent amount of time. I would wear it as a daytime scent. I also enjoy the bottle it comes in.

I recently had an encounter with a young maiden whom, I came to understand, was wearing this scent. It accentuated her already remarkable beauty in the most delightful manner. My only qualm was that it reduced the length of our entanglement by some considerable length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing. It has my favorite jasmine notes combined with some nice fruity scent. It is very long lasting and feminine. The travel size is great for carry in the purse and I am about to purchase the full size already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is heavenly! With notes like peony, blackcurrant,  and white amber it is so dreamy and feminine. It reminds me of a secret garden. It lasts for hours on my skin and leaves a beautiful scent trail. I fell in love with this perfume at first sniff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so sure I would love the love shack fancy perfumes, but this one specifically surpassed my expectations. This is the most elegant, beautiful, fresh scent and I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is a muted floral with a lovely powder under note that creates an younger version of classic powdery fragrances. I think this scent matches love shack fancy to a t, it smells so girly and classic I love it! I feel so mature and girly when I wear this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you love florals and classic peony scents, this is the one for you! i would say it also has a baby powder-y kind of tone and would be good as a day to night fragrance. the travel spray is a bit small compared to my others. wish i received the full size bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful floral scent perfect for spring! Has beautiful fragrant notes of peony, white amber, tuberose, and black currant. Dries down on the skin beautifully and has a very long wear time! The perfect spring floral

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a lovely fragrance!! I personally adore peonies, so finding a perfume with strong notes of peony has always been on my list. This did not disappoint! This is such a gorgeous floral fragrance - honestly, it is pretty much a quintessential floral to me, as I don’t get much other than floral, but it has a touch of sweetness from the black currant. I really like it, and I love the blue packaging. So pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the prettiest smelling floral perfume. I can really smell the Jasmine but it's not your granny's floral. It's a young and very energetic scent. I would recommend this to any floral lover. Boheme is going to be a go to scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently picked up Boheme Eau de Parfum and it’s been such a delightful addition to my collection. Right off the bat, the blend of peony, blackcurrant, and white amber really stood out to me. The peony is light and floral, while the blackcurrant adds a nice touch of fruitiness that's not too overpowering. The white amber ties it all together with a hint of warmth that makes the perfume feel cozy and inviting.  There's something about this scent that just makes me feel happy and at ease. It’s become my go-to fragrance when I want to feel a bit more put-together. If you’re looking for a new scent that’s both fresh and comforting, I’d definitely recommend giving Boheme a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a fragrance from this brand and I would love to try more from them after experiencing Boh\eme. The main notes I get from this scent peony, black currant and white amber. I don’t wear a lot of floral scents but this fragrance makes me feel very feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells absolutely incredible! I love the whole aesthetic of Loveshackfancy and their scents do not disappoint!! This is a beautiful, feminine, soft floral..On the opening I get a freshly bloomed peony mixed with subtle fruity blackcurrant and an undertones of warm amber. Lots of delicate florals at play in the background tying all the notes together! Boh\eme is a MUST have if your a perfume lover, it's elegant and classy and will have heads turning!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance with its notes of peony, blackcurrant, & white amber has been love for me at first smell. Two sprays were enough to immediately transport me to my grandmother's garden where she had peonies planted and I could always smell their scent in the distance. I remember that in my childhood I used to love cutting the peonies and making small bouquets to put in vases around the house. What makes this fragrance more delicious is the perfect combination of peonies with the blush of a blackcurrant and the notes of blooms that are touched with white flowers like tuberose, rose, and jasmine, while soft white amber and sandalwood offer a smooth and soft finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Boheme by Love Shack Fancy is a sophisticated, elegant floral fragrance. The top notes of blackcurrant and pink apple, heart notes of peony, rose, and jasmine, and base notes of white amber, tuberose, and sandalwood combine to create a stunning scent landscape. It evokes feelings of luxury and serenity. The enveloping scent projects well and has excellent silliage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not usually into floral perfumes, but I love this one! The notes of peony, blackcurrant, and white amber work so well together to create a clean smelling floral scent. It lasts me all day long too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this because I love peonies. But it smells like an old cheap perfume and baby powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE LOVE the smell butit literally doesn’t stay on at all! Girl disappears faster than a toupee on a windy day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to get this because of some of the reviews, and I actually love this, so I'm leaving my own review.  The key notes listed (black currant, peony, and amber) are not the stars of this fragrance. This is, at its core, a white floral. My skin pulls the jasmine and tuberose the most, then some peony, and the amber and sandalwood sit prettily in the background. It reminds me at times of Pure Poison. This beauty has staying power and projection; a date night fragrance and a compliment getter. Boheme is romantic, sophisticated, clean, and lovely. I have all three of the LoveShackFancy perfumes, and this one is my unexpected favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The peony note opens strong with a very floral forward mix of tuberose, rose and jasmine. There’s a hint of sweet black current but in my opinion, the black current note gets lost in all the florals. This is a true floral fragrance but I was hoping the black current note would be stronger and sweeter. I do pick up on subtle hints of white amber and sandalwood but again they seem to get lost in the florals for me. This one personally isn’t my favorite, but if you love all the florals then this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

Spherical blooms are joined by touches of white flowers, including tuberose, rose, and jasmine. Soft white amber and sandalwood offer a smooth and soft finish.  Scent Type: Classic Floral  Fragrance Notes: Top~ Blackcurrant, Pink Apple  Heart~ Peony, Rose, Jasmine  Base~ White Amber, Tuberose, Sandalwood  This reminds me of being in a beautiful secret garden surrounded by gorgeous, blooming, fresh flowers in an enchanted fairytale world. This gorgeous feminine floral luxurious scent will make you feel like a stunning princess waiting for her prince charming to arrive.   @LoveShackFancy~ Boh\eme Eau de Parfum Travel Spray 10ml

Once it dries down you can appreciate the black currant. The dry down also gives me a soapy note which I love. I would pair this with a warm vanilla to make it more sensual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this perfume based on the notes but it’s not for me, a little too strong for my taste but absolutely great if you like scents that make a statement. Definitely get the rose and jasmine but I think the amber is strong too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Classic Floral scents are timeless and elegant, perfect for those who appreciate traditional femininity. This scent type features a combination of floral notes that create a sophisticated and romantic fragrance. The top notes of Blackcurrant and Pink Apple give a fruity and fresh opening to the scent. The heart notes of Peony, Rose, and Jasmine add a classic floral touch, providing a sweet and delicate aroma. The base notes of White Amber, Tuberose, and Sandalwood give a warm and sensual finish to the fragrance, making it perfect for evening wear. Overall, Classic Floral scents are perfect for those who love a feminine and refined fragrance that exudes grace and elegance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While I love this line - this wasn’t the scent for me. A bit too strong of a floral. I was hoping for some notes of jasmine, something more luxurious and fresh. But it smells a bit mature and powdery. I love the Moondance fragrance for that warmer, younger, sweeter vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Love Shack Fancy Mini Perfume is a delightful classic floral scent that transports you to a garden in full bloom. With its enchanting blend of floral notes, it's a fragrance that embodies elegance and timeless charm. The scent is both light and romantic, making it perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. The longevity of this perfume is impressive, as it lingers throughout the day without becoming overpowering. The mini-sized bottle is not only adorable but also convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. One of the standout features of this fragrance is its versatility. Whether you're heading to a brunch with friends, a romantic dinner date, or a casual day out, the Love Shack Fancy Mini Perfume complements any occasion with its floral sophistication. The packaging is also worth mentioning. It's beautifully designed, making it a lovely addition to your vanity or a thoughtful gift for someone special. Overall, this classic floral-scented perfume from Love Shack Fancy is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the timeless allure of floral fragrances.
